common.upgradeRequired: Upgrade to {plan} or higher to access this feature.

metadata.title: mkpdfs - PDF Generation API for Developers
metadata.description: PDF generation without the infrastructure headache. Upload HTML templates, call our API, get PDFs. No Puppeteer setup, no Chromium maintenance.

hero.title: PDF Generation
hero.subtitle: Stop wrestling with Puppeteer, Chromium crashes, and scaling headless browsers. Upload your HTML templates, call our API, get PDFs. We handle the infrastructure.

features.title: Skip the infrastructure. Ship faster.
features.subtitle: Everything you'd build yourself—already running, tested, and ready to scale.

handlebars.name: Handlebars Templates
handlebars.description: Write HTML + Handlebars, upload once, generate forever. Partials, helpers, conditionals—all supported.

fast.name: Fast & Reliable
fast.description: Pre-warmed browsers, no cold starts. Sync for quick jobs, async with webhooks for heavy batches.

api.name: One API Call
api.description: POST your data, get a PDF URL back. That's it. Works from any language, any framework.

secure.name: Secure & Isolated
secure.description: Your templates and data are isolated per account. Encrypted API keys. No shared state.

analytics.name: Usage Tracking
analytics.description: See exactly what you're using. Track generation counts, monitor trends, export for billing reconciliation.

team.name: Team Ready
team.description: Multiple API keys, shared templates. Give your team access without sharing credentials.

pricing.title: Cheaper than building it yourself
pricing.subtitle: No servers to maintain. No Chromium updates. Pay only for what you use.

cta.title: Ship PDF generation this week
cta.subtitle: Free tier. No credit card. Takes 5 minutes to integrate.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your mkpdfs account

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Start generating PDFs in minutes
register.name: Full Name
register.confirmEmail: Please check your email to confirm your account.
register.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.subtitle: We sent a verification code to {email}

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset code
forgotPassword.success: Check your email for the reset link.
forgotPassword.successSubtitle: We sent a password reset code to {email}
forgotPassword.checkInbox: Check your inbox for a password reset code. It may take a few minutes to arrive.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter the code from your email and your new password
resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully. You can now sign in.

dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your PDF generation today.

generatePdf.name: Generate PDF
generatePdf.description: Create a PDF from your templates

gettingStarted.title: Get Started with mkpdfs
gettingStarted.intro: Follow these steps to start generating PDFs:

templates.title: My Templates
templates.subtitle: Your template library for PDF generation.

empty.title: No templates yet
empty.description: Create your first template to start generating PDFs.

card.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

create.title: Create Template
create.subtitle: Create a new template by uploading a file or generating with AI.

generate.title: Generate PDF
generate.subtitle: Create a PDF from your templates with custom data.
generate.jsonDataHint: Enter the data that will be merged with your Handlebars template.
generate.successDescription: Your PDF is ready to download.
generate.previewPlaceholder: Your generated PDF will appear here.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage API keys for programmatic access to mkpdfs.

empty.title: No API keys yet
empty.description: No API keys yet. Create one above.

card.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? This action cannot be undone.

createDialog.title: Create API Key
createDialog.description: Create a new API key for programmatic access to the mkpdfs API.
createDialog.name: Key Name
createDialog.nameHint: A descriptive name to identify this key.

apiKeys.warning: Save this key now - it won't be shown again!

usage.title: Usage
usage.subtitle: Track your page generation and resource usage. Each data object counts as 1 page.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Full Name
profile.emailHint: Contact support to change your email.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
danger.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription and payment methods.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You must be logged in to access this page.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this resource.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.

aiGenerate.title: AI Generate
aiGenerate.subtitle: Create professional PDF templates using AI. Describe what you need and let AI generate the template for you.

integration.title: Code Integration
integration.subtitle: Integrate PDF generation into your applications with our API.

body.title: Request Body
body.description: The data that will be merged with your Handlebars template.
body.csvDropzone: Drop CSV file here or click to upload
body.csvMaxRows: Maximum {count} rows allowed per request. Your CSV has {current} rows.

method.description: Choose how you want to generate your PDF.

sync.title: Synchronous
sync.description: Best for small templates. Returns the PDF URL directly in the response.

async.title: Asynchronous
async.description: Best for large documents or batch processing. Returns a job ID to check status.
async.webhookDescription: We'll POST the result to this URL when the job completes.

test.note: This will use your API quota.
test.description: Test your PDF generation with the configured settings.
test.jobStarted: Job has been queued for processing.
test.jobQueued: Your job is being processed. Click 'Check Status' to see if it's completed.
test.checkStatusHint: Click to check if your async job has completed

codeSnippets.title: Code Snippets
codeSnippets.webhookDescription: This is the JSON payload we'll POST to your webhook URL when the job completes.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: All requests must include your API key in the X-Api-Key header.

webhook.title: Webhook Payload
webhook.description: When a job completes (success or failure), we POST this payload to your webhookUrl.

batch.title: Batch Generation
batch.description: Pass an array of objects in the data field. Each object becomes one page in the PDF (max 50 per request).

ai.promptPlaceholder: e.g., Invoice template with company logo, line items table with quantity, description, unit price and total, tax calculation section, and payment terms at the bottom...

imageUpload.title: Reference Image (Optional)
imageUpload.dropzone: Drop image or click to upload
imageUpload.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload PNG, JPEG, or WebP.
imageUpload.tooLarge: Image too large. Maximum size is 5MB.

preview.noContent: Enter a prompt and generate a template to see preview

feedback.label: What would you like to change?
feedback.placeholder: e.g., Make the header larger, add a footer with page numbers, change the color scheme to blue...

marketplace.title: Template Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Browse and use professionally designed templates for your PDFs.
marketplace.empty: No templates found matching your criteria.
marketplace.emptySearch: Try a different search term or category.
marketplace.emptyDefault: Check back later for new templates.
marketplace.limitReached: Template limit reached. Upgrade your plan to add more templates.

mp-business-invoice.name: Professional Invoice
mp-business-invoice.description: Clean, professional invoice template with itemized billing, tax calculations, and payment terms. Perfect for freelancers and small businesses.

mp-business-quote.name: Service Quote
mp-business-quote.description: Professional quote/estimate template for service-based businesses. Includes detailed service breakdown and validity period.

mp-business-receipt.name: Payment Receipt
mp-business-receipt.description: Simple, clean payment receipt for confirming transactions. Ideal for retail and service businesses.

mp-cert-completion.name: Course Completion Certificate
mp-cert-completion.description: Elegant certificate for course or training completion. Features a professional design with customizable colors and fields.

mp-cert-achievement.name: Achievement Award
mp-cert-achievement.description: Recognition certificate for outstanding achievements. Perfect for employee recognition, academic awards, or competition winners.

mp-cert-participation.name: Participation Certificate
mp-cert-participation.description: Certificate acknowledging event or program participation. Great for workshops, conferences, and community events.

mp-marketing-brochure.name: Product Brochure
mp-marketing-brochure.description: Professional product brochure template with features, pricing, and call-to-action. Ideal for product launches and sales materials.

mp-marketing-flyer.name: Event Flyer
mp-marketing-flyer.description: Eye-catching flyer for events and promotions. Features bold design elements and clear call-to-action.

mp-marketing-newsletter.name: Email Newsletter
mp-marketing-newsletter.description: Professional newsletter template with sections for articles, updates, and CTAs. Perfect for regular customer communications.

mp-personal-resume.name: Modern Resume
mp-personal-resume.description: Clean, modern resume template with sections for experience, skills, and education. ATS-friendly design.

mp-personal-letter.name: Formal Letter
mp-personal-letter.description: Professional letter template for business correspondence. Includes proper formatting and structure.

mp-personal-invitation.name: Event Invitation
mp-personal-invitation.description: Elegant invitation template for parties and events. Customizable design for any occasion.

mp-personal-cover-letter.name: Cover Letter
mp-personal-cover-letter.description: Professional cover letter template for job applications. Modern design with sections for key achievements and why you're the perfect fit.

contactEnterprise.title: Contact Enterprise Sales
contactEnterprise.description: Tell us about your needs and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contactEnterprise.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your requirements, expected volume, and any specific needs...
contactEnterprise.successMessage: Thank you! Our team will contact you within 24 hours.
contactEnterprise.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.
contactEnterprise.rateLimitMessage: Too many requests. Please try again later.
